title: Wind Cave National Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions         Needles Highway in Custer State Park   Wind Cave National Park is located in the Black Hills of South Dakota. Nearby are several national park and South Dakota state park units. The Black Hills National Forest covers much of the area.       Nearby National Park Service Sites Jewel Cave National Monument 605-673-8300 32 miles; 50 minutes Mount Rushmore National Memorial 605-574-2523 40 miles; 1 hour via U.S. 385 and Hwy. 244 Agate Fossil Beds National Monument 308-668-2211 136 miles; 2.5 hours Devils Tower National Monument 307-467-5283 130 miles; 2.5 hours Minuteman Missile National Historic Site 605-433-5552 127 miles; 2 hours Badlands National Park 605-433-5361 128 miles; 2.25 hours to Ben Reifel Visitor Center and Park Headquarters Other Attractions Custer State Park 605-255-4515 8.4 miles to park boundary, 13.3 miles to the Wildlife Loop Road, 25.7 miles Mickelson Trail 8.1 miles to the nearest trailhead at Pringle, SD Mammoth Site 605-745-6017 15 miles; 23 minutes Angostura State Recreation Area 605-745-6996 23 miles; 34 minutes Black Hills National Forest 605-673-225 The park is bounded to the west by the National Forest, 21 miles to the Headquarters Local Partners & Information Resources  Hot Springs, SD  Custer, SD  Black Hills Parks and Forest Association
